Text:
I see you uploading all the Bleach and Naruto Manga, is there any chance that you have the Case Closed Manga? Been looking for them and can't find them on TPB or any other sites

Thanks

I'm sorry, right now I am only doing Naruto and Bleach. Maybe at a later time I will do more. If you just google search around you can find them available for download. Not always by torrent, but they have other means to download them.
Thumbs up at u man, ty for this !!!!  =)
Well done mate thanks for your hard-work

Hey, thanks so much for all of your hard work! I've download the entirety of the manga you have available--for both Naruto and Bleach.
Btw, I don't know if you knew this, but I think that the next set of 10 is available for both of them, as well. :) I really appreciate your uploading, and hope TPB will continue to hear from you!
